lender.name: YEI
lender.loan_because: Need Support Please make a difference in the lives of the needy by supporting YEI. For $10 you can help one person enroll for ARVs, $50 can pay a year's school fees for an orphan, $100 can sponsor a radio program on HIV for a whole month, $500 can help two vulnerable youth acquire valuable vocational skills.
lender.occupational_info:
We exist to equip vulnerable children and youths in our community with self-support skills and knowledge of protecting themselves against the risk of HIV/AIDS and violence.
Our strategies are focused on resolving the most pressing needs of the community and include programs that enhance the capacity of marginalized groups to take charge of the issues that affect them.

lender.name: Stone
lender.occupation: Granite India, Marble India, Sandstone India
lender.loan_because: Granite India, Marble India, Sandstone India
lender.occupational_info:
Resource International (RI) is promoters of Stone Resources brand for all kind of natural and decoative stones used in building and construction.
We are India based Granite, Marble and Sandstone manufacturer, supplir, trader and exporter having headquarters at Udaipur, Rajasthan and sales network all over India including Mumbai, Maharashtra, Delhi, Gujarat, Karnataka, Kerala, Andhra Pradesh, Tamilnadu, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh, Punjab, Hariyana, Uttarachal, Himachal Pradesh, West bengal, Bihar, Jharkhand, Chattisgarh. We are based in the stone hub of India Udaipur and Rajasamand. We can supply Granite from Rajasthan, Jalore, Mokalsar, Jaipur, Jhansi and all leading brandes, We have specialization in Black granite, Black Galaxy Granite, Absolute Black Granite, Kasmir White, New Imperial, and tan Brown. We provide a range of Marble stone like white Marble, Green Marble, Kesariyaji (Kesariaji) Green Marble, Rishabhdeo (Rishabhdev) Green marble Pink Marble. We can provide you Indian Sandstone. We have quality Sand Stone from India specially Jodhpur, jaisalmer and Dhaulpur.
The Company has an extensive network of professional quarrying and transport agents. Our Goodwill attributes to our exprience for processing almost any kind of Indian Stones; be it Granite, Marble and Sandstone Tiles, Slabs, Vertical Cutter Slabs, Cut to Sizes, Counter Tops, Steps, Risers etc.
Stone resources is an embodiment of vision and enthusiasm of experienced professionals with a firm background of ten years of experience in the Granite, Marble and Sandstone industry in India. Over the years, we have developed high specialization in production of All types of Marbles, Granites, Sand stones, Lime stones, Slate Stones.
Stone Resource International has been prentely exporting stone products like Granite, marble and Sandstone to USA (America), United Kingdom (UK), Russia, Europe, Middle East countries like Oman, Dubai, Musqat, UAE, South Africa, Egypt, Italy and China, We are in process to expand our sales network in the international market all over the world. We are looking forward to expand business and make fruitful associations with reputed companies of stone market in India and abroad.
Stone Reosurces is known for its diligence in delivering high quality Products. We own an in-house fully equipped infrastructure, which capacitates us supply or export stipulated natural and decorative stone material within scheduled time. Our asset is the team, which is professional, committed, hard-working and can meet your needs with utmost ease and constitency.
Resource International is a service oriented company where we process, manufacture and trade slabs, tiles, blocks and articles of Granite, Marble, Sandstone, Slates and kota Stone from India. You can chose from our wide product range that varies from classic to contemporary. Our maintained quality standards and rich selection of colors, textures and finishes injects life in distinctive designs with the durability and elegance.
Our relationship with a netwok of 15 Granite, marble, sandstone and other natural and decorative stones quarries across the India qualifies us as the most sought after company in Asia region and intrnational stone market.
We value our customers and aspire to give the optimum returns to the value of their money. With a decade long experience in quarrying, cutting, polishing, and fabrication, we can provide anything that suits your requirements. We are committed to serve not only Indian construction and building market but also the global market with poise, diligence and commitment.

lender.name: Troy

lender.name: Michael Aischmann
lender.loan_because: I was so deeply moved by Jessicas talk on www.ted.com and I infact always wanted to share the resources witch I have been fortuned enought to have. I wanted to participate in business models developing over time and supporting new (and old) ideas that help people stand on their own feet. The fact that I can do this globaly and also in a manner witch actually helps to ease the suffering in our world by providing entrepreneurs with the resources to change their own lives and the lives of entire communities around them - that was the key insight that kiva brought to me. I am very thankful for this opportunity and I am looking forward to become even more invested into this program an in the community around it! THANK YOU!
lender.occupational_info: I play poker online on a regular basis with a big database and various features that help me make the right decisions. I constantly improove my knowledge about poker since this is necessary to be able to outplay your opponents. I also trade stocks and similar financial products.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I worked in Tajikistan for a few years and want to do what I can to help out in a sustainable way.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying International Development

lender.name: Marisela
lender.loan_because:
it is exciting to see fellow entrepreneurs given a hand up (not a handout) and have the opportunity to realize their dreams!
"Do not merely look out for your own personal interests, but also for the interests of others." Philippians 2:4
lender.occupational_info:
I support Kiva Field Partners (lenders) who provide loans as well as the GOSPEL!
Here are two:
Hope (a partner of HOPE International Ukraine) www.kiva.org/partners/26
Fodemi (a partner of World Vision International Ecuador) www.kiva.org/partners/188
Here is a list of 21 CHRISTIAN Kiva Field Partners that are "dedicated to helping people both practically and financially via microcredit, and spiritually via the gospel of Jesus Christ."http://www.kivapedia.org/index.php?title=Christian_Field_Partners&printable=yes
By giving them loans we are making an important yet temporary difference, but by sharing the GOSPEL, we are making an ETERNAL difference!!

lender.name: Aron
lender.loan_because: I live in capitalist Europe, an our system is based on spening all we earn or more. Instead of borrowing to lead a unsustainable life, I wish to use my monthly surplus to create a synergy of wealth in the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I make print materials for companies and individuals. Our company employs about 30 people plus a few franchises. My daily work consists of making business cards, posters, paperback books, brochures etc.
I also work with the customer base, creating relations to streamline production so that it is as if we work in the same company, sharing a common goal.

lender.name: Humanitees
lender.loan_because: Humanitees supports Humanity. We see only love and beauty in all the delightful human beings of the world. We support the realization of equality of all beings. We are a Fairtrade T-shirt business. And with each t-shirt sale, we lend a part of the profits to Kiva. Why wouldn't we? It's not our money anyways! When the loan is repaid we re-loan it immediately. Continuing the cycle of contribution.
lender.occupational_info: Humanitees is a website that sells Fairtrade, organic cotton t-shirts. Our aim is to change the world through inspiring and beautiful t-shirt designs. As part of our operations we donate $1 to Kiva borrowers for every sale we make. (www.humaniteesfairtrade.com)

lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: emergencylyt
lender.occupational_info:
Lithonia Lighting introduces a better lighting experience with an innovative design that is also easy on the pockets ‚Äì the Reality LED Downlight. The Reality LED downlight was designed as a lighting solution to rising energy costs and increasingly demanding energy codes. With integrated LED lighting technology, the Reality can deliver quality lighting and remarkable energy savings. To accommodate retrofitting and lighting renovations, the Reality LED is made for easy and quick installation. It fits in most popular six inch housings and can easily replace its incandescent and CFL counterparts. It is also sold with a housing or as a module to fit a wide range of downlighting applications. The Reality‚Äôs LED lights are rated for over 50,000 hours of service which virtually eliminates the need for lamp replacement. It also uses 80% less energy than a standard 65W BR30 lamp, making it a truly cost effective lighting solution. With Reality LED lighting, you can have high-quality and comfortable lighting for your residential, commercial and architectural spaces. Read more about Emergency Lighting through these sites
Emergency light Los Angeles
Emergency light Chicago
Emergency light Philadelphia
Emergency light Miami
Emergency light Dallas
Emergency light NYC Hazardous Area lighting Philadelphia
Hazardous Area lighting Miami
Emergency lighting Philadelphia
Emergency lighting Miami
